wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Ferrars (6 September 1907 – 30 March 1995), born Morna Doris MacTaggart, was a British crime writer.

response: In the 20th century the village attracted a number of notable artists and writers. Writers have included Elizabeth Ferrars, Alt URL Dick Francis (from 1954 to 1980), Kenneth Grahame, Marguerite Steen,"Who Was Who: 1971–1980", London, A. & C. Black GB Stern, Barbara Euphan Todd and Ben Fergusson.  Artists have included William Nicholson,Sophie Bowness (2004). Nicholson, Sir William Newzam Prior (1872–1949). Oxford Dictionary of National Biography (online edition). Oxford University Press. . father of abstract painter Ben Nicholson, illustrator Susan Beatrice « Twissie » Pearse children's book illustrator, including Amelia Anne series, H Davis Richter known for much-reproduced interiors and Eli Marsden Wilson. The tradition continues, and keen amateur artists receive direction from the professional artists Roy East and Ron Freeborn. The village used to have an art gallery devoted to the work of local artists.

After the war Winterton became an author of crime and mystery fiction full-time. He was a founder-member of the Crime Writers' Association during 1953 and, with Elizabeth Ferrars, its first joint secretary.
|Elizabeth Ferrars||Your Neck in a Noose [US title: Neck in a Noose]
